Articles.Content:
KSO is just 439MB installed. Dunno why it would be that high.

Most users overlook the fact that the Squad and NASAmission folders are also within GameData, and occupy a little over 780MB combined.
Neat. I like the EWBCL. As for the sounds, it does seem logical for Nazari to handle them (though TBH, I could try, if you wanted. That's some config work and a few test flights ).

New Album comparing the two. WIP still!

http://imgur.com/a/Ca1z5

SOOOO Beautiful!, (wipes tear from eye) Keep up the great work.

Hmm odd ill check again as I have 8gb of ram in my laptop with a Gforce GTX 650m graphics card. I run far more resource heavy games like planetside 2 just fine. I'll do some digging to see if I double installed something. But just for those that want the 25. Could you please make it it's own pack? I will really have no use for the KSO once the 25 gets here, as the KSO can't hold the big parts.

f the KSOS project are locked in. Definitely something for the future. Nazari has been experimenting with such effects. EWBCL needs to be released already, I'm far behind as it is and I'm not going to waste time experimenting with new features.

New Album comparing the two. WIP still!

http://imgur.com/a/Ca1z5

helldiver that looks amazing. Simply amazing.

Looks killer and you can really see the size difference when they are side by side or in the same picture. I am really looking forward to this. Also I noticed that the KSO can almost fit inside the EWBCL if you take off the wings, I hear you like shuttles so we put a shuttle inside a shuttle. LOL I can see that meme already showing up now too...
Does the new larger Shuttle carry more crew?

If I ever accidentally destroy the Reliant I will call the replacement Reliant-K

I relish the progress reports. Keep 'em comin'!
I really cant wait to start my EOV (Extended Orbiter Vehicle) line with the Super 25. Its gonna be great.

If I ever accidentally destroy the Reliant I will call the replacement Reliant-K

I just hope some genetically enhanced madman doesn't steal it, that would be a pain in the ass.

Helldiver: Love it.

How does it fly?

Can someone tell me where this truss is from? it looks like KSO but i can't find it...

http://i.imgur.com/lAAOaeV.jpg

uhh i think that truss was improvised from B9 parts such as the railings

Helldiver: Love it.

How does it fly?

As far as I know... as of right now; It doesnt. Fly that is. Its still being textured.
Very nice, does the EWBCL use the same engine mount as the mini shuttle? I am hoping this will work with the cacteye telescope mod.
actually, it looks like its much bigger, assuming the bay is long enough, you shouldn't have a problem fitting the Cacteye in the payload bay.

i just hope some genetically enhanced madman doesn't steal it, that would be a pain in the ass.

khaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaan!!!!!!!!!!!!
This new shuttle reminds me of the spaceplane from one of the episodes of the Rescue Rangers cartoon. I've watched it a lot as a kid.

I made video.. Is there a new shuttle out? I WANT! I've been having a blast with this shuttle. Man the solar panels are hard to fit in the cargo bay. First time i barely got it out and a solar panel broke. Second try I had to RCS forward after undocking from the back to keep it from jamming.
Will the Mundoor on the Super 25 act as an extra docking port or airlock?

Will the Mundoor on the Super 25 act as an extra docking port or airlock?

It fits a standard sized docking port in it.

It fits a standard sized docking port in it.

Ah. I was hoping that it extended like the FASA docking port..

Streaming shortly

-I will be streaming today at 7:30 PM PST (Pacific Standard Time). For those of you that have questions or want to see me work.

Hope to see some of you guys there!

http://www.twitch.tv/fanbus
Thanks again for the stream man, shes really turning out to be something. The hype just keeps intensifying.

Streaming shortly

-I will be streaming today at 7:30 PM PST (Pacific Standard Time). For those of you that have questions or want to see me work.

Hope to see some of you guys there!

http://www.twitch.tv/fanbus

You're Super 25 shuttle is coming along great. I especially like the main gear animation. I hope you don't mind, I made a GIF of it to show here.

The Super25?

Yes, all my money. Please take it!

It's free?

I don't care. Money. Take it.
